text: Richard Taylor "Dick" Schulze (born August 7, 1929) is a Republican politician. He served as a member of the U.S. House of Representatives from 1975 to 1993. ==Other websites== *Stennis Center for Public Service *The Political Graveyard * Category:1929 births Category:Living people Category:United States representatives from Pennsylvania Category:Businesspeople from Philadelphia Category:Politicians from Philadelphia Category:Members of the Pennsylvania General Assembly Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians
title: Dick Schulze
